title: IPH 445 - All hail the power of Jesus’ name!

lines: All hail the power of Jesus’ name!
and crown Him Lord of all.
Crown Him, you martyrs of our God,
exalt the One whose path you trod,
and crown Him Lord of all.
hail him who saves you by His grace,
and crown Him Lord of all.
and crown Him Lord of all.

CCLI:
Edward Perronet, 1726-1792
and John Rippon, 1751-1836 adapted Compilers of Praise! 2000 CCLI 128675
